_header: In place as man may see / When a child to school shall set be
Subjects: alphabetic poems; Passion, meditations on; Christ, Passion of; envoys
_description: An ABC poem on the Passion — in 6-line stanzas

BLHar3954.First Lines: A place as man may seQuan a chyld to scole xal set be…
BLHar3954.Last Lines: …As was þe spere in to þin herteQuan þu suffrydyst ded for me

NLS18721.First Lines:
Lich as man may seWan child to skole set beA boke him is i
                    brouth…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…& ȝeft his bodi in forme of bredÞat sal us alle
                    borwe
NLS18721.Note:
1 stanzas in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook plus three line
                    envoy.
